item.title: 'Nobody’s going to believe him': Trump’s Greenland 'deal' sparks relief — and confusion
item.description: Trump said he had the "concept of a deal" on Greenland, but didn't share details of the agreement — or who agreed to it.

item.title: China's investment crash raises credit risks for homebuilders, banks, government: Fitch
item.description: China’s sharp investment downturn is amplifying credit risks across the economy, weighing on the credit profiles of homebuilders, banks and local gove...

item.title: China says trade deal with U.S. will 'drain Taiwan’s economy' for American benefits
item.description: China doubled down its rhetorics on the trade agreement between Taiwan and the U.S., saying it would benefit Washington while eroding the island's str...

item.title: UK inflation rises to 3.4% in December, above forecasts
item.description: The U.K. inflation rate rose to 3.4% in December, above forecasts of 3.3% from economists polled by Reuters.

item.title: China keeps benchmark lending rates unchanged despite slowing economic growth
item.description: The People's Bank of China held its 1-year and 5-year loan prime rates at 3% and 3.5%, respectively, keeping them unchanged for an eighth straight mon...
